text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(In my body――I can truly feel it. 
The sun――feels so close)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(I was finally able to obtain it. The title that I admired. And…… 
the future that Kraft and I are aiming for, we're one step closer)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Once again, once again I…… 
Is this some kind of curse!?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
The race developed just like I expected! And Cesario-san 
shouldn't have been able to outrun me. Even still, why……!?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Air Messiah-san…… Please don't be so harsh on yourself. 
You…… "both of you" were strong. That strength――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Opened my eyes. I was able to break away from my old 
self. Becoming a better version of myself led to victory.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: A better version……of yourself……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, thank you very much. Today, thanks to you, 
I was able to calm down and draw out my full strength.
Yeah, you really showed your full potential!
Yeah, you really showed your full potential!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Cesario!!

At that moment, an overjoyed voice 
came ringing through the tunnel

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations, Cesario! 
I saw it……! I saw it all……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations on winning the 『Oaks』! 
Let's keep working hard for our futures!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, Kraft. I couldn't break my promise to you. 
There was……no way I could.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Mile and medium distance. Though we have different 
aptitudes, we are "Companions". And――a "Team".

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yeah…… yeah……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san too, thank you very much!
choice_data_list: Me too, I want to thank you too!

text_block_list.text:
Cesario had won. This proved that we had made 
the correct choices. In that moment, I was relieved.

In this way, Team <Ascella>'s spring ended 
in the best way possible. With the 『Oka Sho』 
『NHK Mile C』 and 『Oaks』, 3 G1 victories.

That also meant that certain events needed 
to be held. So preparations for renting out 
a large party venue were proceeding steadily――

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hold on! What's with this, you blockhead!? 
Your collar is a mess.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
It'll be troubling if you can't fix it properly. 
You're the team's representative, you know?

Yeah, sorry, sorry. I was a little distracted. 
I'll take care of it myself.

Yeah, sorry, sorry. I was a little distracted. 
I'll take care of it myself.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Distracted……? 
What's that paper in your hand?
Well……this is……
Well……this is……

A letter had arrived. I was staring at it, 
considering Team <Ascella> and Cesario's future.

But, I can't just keep thinking about it. For 
now, I decided to put the letter in the chest 
pocket of my formal attire and focus on the party.
